data.message: Thank you so much for coming and doing our show!! You will never know how much it means to us that you chose our small town to promote your movie and the Late Show!! Kaye Lani Rafko-Wilson :) thank you so very much ❤️💋💛💋💚

replies.message: You and Kaye Lani were great!!
Ladies, your laughter is contagious. Thanks for that. I was so happy to hear the reference to the whole county as this is my home. Very fun. It made my day.
Really cool to see Colbert again it's been so long. And eminem is the man!!

Hi.. young girl's
You all are right but in every year...
He improve his voice strength in fastest raps....

He must be have granny award...
You ladies did a wonderful job!
That was great. Be safe painting your nails and NOT driving haha
So I live in San Diego and am from Cheboygan County. I've shared this everywhere so everyone can see how awesome it is in Monroe and Michigan in General. ❤️
Eric thank you for your service!
One of the most awkwardly hilarious things I've watched in a long time, thanks so much for being great sports!!
what a scream, I thought you and Kaye Lani held your own, how fun! Colbert fan AND Michigander
I know isn't it kind of surreal though?? Thank you for watching :)
I thought it was absolutely hilarious how he said y'all's entire names every time he addressed you xD

My two favorite celebrities, the brilliant Stephen and the best rapper ever, on such an amazing local show. THANK YOU. And PS Sexy Divide by Essie is one of my fave colors! And I am wearing Jamaican Me Crazy in gel form..
Thank you all again for saying such positive things about the show💗💗💗💗

Do you have a #Monster within you? Im sure everybody does somewhere deep in themselves right. I would like to present to you 

" JaySaint Da Synnr - Im a Monster now x Sir Flo x Sammi Auto "

Just a lil Single i cooked up with some homies from my Home town. Enjoy the track and Share away. Dont forget to VOTE today for my submission in the FV contest this year and get Ready for my new Album that will be dropping soon. #ChronicLogic
